item.title: Update: Heat Advisory issued August 28 at 3:55AM EDT until A
item.description: Update: Heat Advisory issued August 28 at 3:55AM EDT until August 28 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston WV Greenup; Boyd; Perry; Morgan; Athens; Washington; Jackson; Vinton; Meigs; Gallia; Lawrence; Wayne; Cabell; Mason; Jackson; Wood; Pleasants; Tyler; Lincoln; Putnam; Kanawha; Roane; Wirt; Calhoun; Ritchie; Doddridge; Logan; Boone; Clay; Braxton; Gilmer; Lewis; Harrison * WHAT...Heat index values up to 103 expected. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Kentucky, southeast Ohio, and central, northern, southern, and western West Virginia. * WHEN...From noon to 8 PM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat illnesses. Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances.

item.title: On Thursday, August 29, 2024, Mon Power has a planned power
item.description: On Thursday, August 29, 2024, Mon Power has a planned power outage scheduled to upgrade facilities. The outage will affect customers in the vicinity of Blenn Lake Rd, Blennerhasset Heights, and Island View Dr. The service interruption will be from approximately 7:00 am to 1:00 pm. In the event of inclement weather, (to be determined by Mon Power), the planned outage will be rescheduled for Friday, August 30, 2024. If you have any questions please call Mon Power at: 1-800-686-0022.
